text: Hello Everyone ! I have a PHP site running on a Mysql DB . Looking to integrate HS forms and Sync the Mysql DB with HS . Any suggestions on what is the best route to sync the two databases

I think a new channel should be added in this slack for the new editor - I have some questions about it and I'm sure more and more people will have some as time goes on since so many of the changes are dramatic. (like all of the sudden unsupported hubl features)
